headline: Pharma Stocks Aren't in the Clear, Despite Tariff Exemption—Heard on the Street
summary: Big pharmaceutical stocks mostly rose after President Trump’s executive order exempted medicines from new tariffs. Merck, Bristol-Myers Squibb, and Johnson & Johnson were among the top performers in the S&P 500, with the sector also benefiting from its status as a defensive play.
